CustomField.formula: IF(ispickval( TP_Account__r.Unify_Account_Type__c ,"N"), "National Account", IF(ispickval( TP_Account__r.Unify_Account_Type__c ,"D"), "Tax Supported", IF(ispickval( TP_Account__r.Unify_Account_Type__c ,"R"), "Enterprise Rep Account", IF(ispickval( TP_Account__r.Unify_Account_Type__c ,"U"), "End User/Directed Buy", IF(ispickval( TP_Account__r.Unify_Account_Type__c ,"C"), "Enterprise Manager Acct", "")))))
CustomField.label: Unify Type
